name: Unlicensed contracting
text: [§481C-2.5]  Unlicensed contracting.  If the contract referred to in section 481C-1 is for activities subject to chapter 444 and the seller does not possess the license required by that chapter, the cancellation period to be provided in section 481C-2 shall be extended to thirty calendar days. [L 1992, c 269, §1]
